statements: DELETE FROM donations WHERE donor_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM donations WHERE donation_amount > 1000 AND donor_name = 'John Smith';
DELETE FROM donations WHERE donation_date < '2021-01-01' AND donation_amount < 500;
DELETE FROM donations WHERE donation_amount > 500 AND donation_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM donations WHERE donor_name = 'John Doe' AND donation_amount > 1000;
DELETE FROM distribution WHERE shelter_id = 2005 AND resource_id = 3002;
